channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: The world welcomes 2025 with light shows, embraces and ice plunges
item.description: From Sydney to Mumbai to Paris to Rio de Janeiro, communities around the world are welcoming 2025 with spectacular light shows, embraces and ice plunges.

item.title: Jimmy the Baptist: Carter redefined ‘evangelical,’ from campaigns to race and women’s rights
Psychedelic therapy begins in Colorado, causing tension between conservatives and veterans
